hero.title:
Duniya ka pehla AI — jo sirf creators ke liye banaya gaya hai.
Ab Private Beta mein.⚡️

valueProposition.description: Late payments, baar-baar yaad dilaana, tax ka jhanjhat — sab khatam! Creators ke liye bana pehla AI — smart payments se shuru, jo aapko zyada aur faster earn karne mein help karta hai. Aap content banao, follow ups hum sambhal lenge.
valueProposition.cta: Free mein invoice bhejna shuru karein

items.title: Chat bheje. Invoice paayein.
items.description: WhatsApp message, email ya brand chat ka screenshot upload karein — ya bas likhein: “Iska invoice bana do.” Baaki ka kaam hamara AI karega. Aapka invoice proper format mein banega, koi typo nahi, GST/pan ki details apne app aa jaegi aur approval ka bhi jhanjhat nahi.
items.highlight: Aap bas content banao, Cashflow hum banayenge!

items.title: Aap content banao. Follow ups hum sambhal lenge.
items.description: Ab “Hey, just checking on the payment?” bhejne ki zarurat nahi. Sparkonomy ka AI polite aur pro payment reminders bhejta hai — WhatsApp aur email par. Aap control mein rehto hain, hum sirf process easy banate hain.
items.highlight: Aap rishte banao. Follow-ups hum sambhal lenge.

items.title: Humare pocket CFO k saath banein pro
items.description: Apne cash flow, overdue payments aur income growth ka update pao har hafte sirf 5 minute mein. Hum aapke records organize rakhte hain aur aapke business ko tax-compliant rahne mein help karte hain.
items.highlight: Aap pro bano, ham aapki help kareinge.

advantage.title: Aapka Advantage
advantage.subtitle: Aise invoices jo aapko jaldi payment dilayein aur aapki pro image banayein!

items.title: Payment Ready
items.description: GST auto calculate hoga aur payment process integrated rahegi

items.title: Tax-Compliant
items.description: GSTIN, HSN, aur barters manage kiye jaate hain.

items.title: Proof Of Work
items.description: Aapka work auto-fetch hain jaega. Screenshots ki koi zarurat nahi.

items.quote: And I have to reach out so many times to get paid in 3 months, and still it hasn't happened 15-20 times! I want you to do my payment reminders
items.name: Food YouTuber

items.quote: I raise invoices once a month mostly. I don't get time… and it delays my payments. I want you help me raise instant invoices in under 5 mins from my phone
items.name: Tech Instagrammer

items.quote: I don't have time to write down and track all payments in Excel and become my own accountant! I want you to track & remind me of my money matters
items.name: Lifestyle Instagrammer

cta.title: Kya aap fast payments ke liye ready hain?

items.question: Main sign up kaise karu?
items.answer: Apna phone number dein - bas! Uske baad apne social handles share karein, apni billing information se related 2-3 easy questions answer karein, aur aap Sparkonomy ke AI ka use karke collaboration DM ka reply dene se bhi zyada fast invoices send kar payeinge!

items.question: Creators ke liye yeh AI aur iska smart payment mere liye kaise useful hain?
items.answer: Sparkonomy Ka AI creators ko apna business, ek pro ki tarah manage karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Smart payments feature ki help se aap invoices fast aur easily bhejh sakte hain. Bas apni chat ya brand collab details share karein, aur hum bina kisi calculation ya brands ke peeche bhaage GST-ready invoice bana denge. Humara pocket CFO aapke payments aur cash flow track kar ke, har week aapko 5 minute ka update bhejta hai. Aur sabse best part- Sparkonomy aapke payments ko automatically track karta hain aur WhatsApp/email par friendly reminders bhejhta hai. Aap hamesha control mein rehte hain kisko reminder milega, with 1-tap quick actions jaise: STOP, DELAY, ya PAYMENT DONE. Zyada kamay. Stress kam lein.

items.question: Invoicing start karne ke liye mujhe meri profile mein kya information add Karni padegi?
items.answer: Bas apna name, address, PAN aur Payment details (UPI ya Bank account) share karein. Agar aapka separate billing organization hai, toh uska PAN aur registration jaise CIN ya GSTIN add karein. Aur, hum jaante hain aap busy hain, isliyee typing ki zarurat nahi hai, bas document ki ek photo lein aur upload karein. Isme 5 minutes se bhi kam time lagta hai, aur aapko ye sirf ek baar hi karna padega!

items.question: Main apna pehla invoice kaise banau?
items.answer: Sparkonomy ka Creator AI aapko kuch tap se 3 minutes se bhi kam time mein invoice banane mein help karta hai - wo bhi aapke phone se. Hamara smart payment feature aapko fast shuruat karne mein help karta hai. Purana invoice duplicate karna hain, WhatsApp ya email ka screenshot upload karna hain with billing instructions, ya bas 'Mujhe iske liye invoice chahiye...' type karein aur dekhein aapke liye ek invoice ban jata hai. Apne invoice mein change lana itna easy hai. Chat bhejein - invoice payein. Ab, aapko invoice bhejne mein kabhi delay nahi hoga!

items.question: Sparkonomy meri taraf se payment reminders kaise bhejhega?
items.answer: Humein pata hai apne haq ke paiso ke liye baar-baar follow-up karna kitna frustrating hota hai. Jab aap apna invoice banate hain, Sparkonomy aapse poochta hain ki kitne reminders bhejne hain aur kitni baar. Hum unhe aapke client ko WhatsApp aur email par bhejenge. Reminder wale din subah 10 AM par hum aapko ping karte hain aur poochte hain ki kya aap abhi bhi reminder bhejna chahte hain aur agar aap yes bolte hain, toh reminder 3 PM par chala jaata hai. Hum sirf 4 friendly reminder bhejte hain: ek check-in, ek soft poke, ek late fees alert, aur ek final notice. Aap STOP, DELAY, ya PAYMENT DONE jese quick replies ke saath control banaye rakh sakte hain. Aap content banao, follow up hum sambhal lenge.

items.question: Pocket CFO kya hai aur yeh kya kaam karega?
items.answer: Hum jaante hai ki aap apne creator business ke accountant nahi banna chahte, aur phir bhi aap vahi ban jate hai! Excel, Canva ya Word mein banaye hue invoices ko manage karna aur track karna impossible hai. Sparkonomy ka pocket CFO AI agent every week aapke payments aur cash flow ka analysis karta hai. Phir yeh aapko cash flow, overdue payments, aur income growth par quick weekly 5-minute update bhejta hai. Yeh aapke saare records ko clean aur aapke business ko tax-ready rakhta hai. Aap pro bano, ham aapki help kareinge.

items.question: Mujhe kitna payment karna hoga?
items.answer: Aap har month maximum 4 new invoices bana sakte hain, unlimited reminders bhej sakte hain, aur apna khud ka Pocket CFO pa sakte hain - jo most creators ke liye perfect hai. Jaise-jaise aapki needs badhti hain, aap kuch friends ko refer karke, ya phir ek cup coffee ke price se bhi kam mein Pro plan par switch kar sakte hain.

items.question: Mere invoices par tax calculate kaise hoga?
items.answer: Ab aapko Tax errors ke liye brands ko chase nahi karna padega. Tax-man se meetings nahi.  GST registered creators ke liye, Sparkonomy AI automatically sahi GST code lagata hai, CGST/SGST/IGST split karta hai, aur invoice ko GST-ready banata hai. Tax compliance hum sambhalte hain. Creation aap.

items.question: Kya AI GST calculate karne mein help karta hai?
items.answer: Yes! Sparkonomy ka AI GST system ko achchi tarah se jaanta hai. Yeh automatically right service code select karta hai, aur sabse achhi baat - hamara invoice template GST ki requirements ko perfectly follow karta hai. Sparkonomy ko saara hard work karne dijiy aur aap shine kijiye!

items.question: Mujhe meri brand services par kitna GST charge karna chahiye?
items.answer: Aapko GST rate ki tension lene ki zarurat nahi hai - Sparkonomy ka AI aapke liye GST ka dhyaan rakhta hai! Yeh automatically aapki service ko sahi HSN code se match karta hai, GST ko IGST, SGST ya CGST mein split karta hai, aur ensure karta hai ki har invoice correct hain. Agar aap GST-registered nahi hain, toh Sparkonomy aapko GST add karne nahi dega, matlab galtiyon ka koi scope nahi. Aapka banaya aur bhejha gya har invoice error-free aur compliant hota hai, jisse aapka time aur stress bachta hai.

items.question: Main Ek brand ko invoice kaise bheju?
items.answer: Jaise aapko pasand hain! Apna invoice complete karne ke baad, Sparkonomy ke through brand ko bhej dein, ya PDF download karke personally email/WhatsApp par send karein. No chasing, no tension - bas fast cash!

items.question: Kya invoice mein apna logo add kar sakte hain?
items.answer: Haan! Hum jaante hain ki aapke invoices aapke unique brand ko reflect karne chahiye. Apna business logo, profile picture upload karein ya bas apne social accounts share karein, aur hum aapki profile photo leke aapke invoices ko personalize kar denge - taaki woh bilkul aapke jaise lage! Bas 1-tap mein har invoice ko ek shiny, pro look dein.

items.question: Kya ek Purchase Order (PO) use karke jaldi se invoice create kar sakte hain?
items.answer: Bilkul! Hum jaante hain speed sab kuch hai. Saare project details manually enter karne ke bajay, jab aap 'Create Invoice' par tap karenge, tab aap brand ka Purchase Order (PO) upload kar sakte hain. Humara smart system instantly document ko breakdown karke basic details jaise brand ka naam, contact info, aur kabhi-kabhi rate bhi pre-fill kar dega - taaki aap details verify karke invoice aur bhi fast bhej sakein.

items.question: Mujhse invoices bhejne mein aksar delay hota hai, kyunki ye ek chore lagta hai ya phir darr lagta hai ki kahin koi mistake na ho jaaye. Is it a big deal?
items.answer: Haan! Agar aap invoice der se bhejte hain, toh brands aapka payment process late start karte hain, jo aapke payment cycle ko 45 se 180 din tak push kar sakta hai - matlab 6 mahine tak wait karna padh sakta hai. Hum bhi yeh delay pasand nahi karte, isliye Sparkonomy ke saath invoicing super simple aur fast bana di hai. Hamara 'Tap-to-Invoice' design aur AI seconds mein 100% accurate, pro invoices bana dete hain. Invoice mistakes aur delays hata kar, hum aapko jaldi payment dilate hain, taaki aap poori tarah se content creation par focus kar sakein!

items.question: Kya aapke invoices meri country ke tax aur service codes ko support karte hain?
items.answer: Haan, bilkul! Sparkonomy ka AI automatically aapki country ke hisaab se aapki service ke liye sabhi mandatory details fill kar deta hai including sahi tax aur service codes. Isse har invoice fully compliant, correctly classified aur legal requirements ke hisaab se ready hota hai, chahe aap filing kar rahe ho ya aapke client ke Input Tax Credit ke liye. Sparkonomy ke saath aapko errors ki chinta karne ki zaroorat nahi - hamara AI sab kuch seamlessly handle karta hai!

items.question: Mujhe lagta hai ki mere invoice mein koi galti hai. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
items.answer: Agar aapka invoice abhi tak send nahi hua hai, toh tension nahi lein - bas apne dashboard par jaiye aur edit option use karke changes kijiye. Agar invoice bhej diya gaya hai aur aap GST-registered nahi hain, toh aap invoice edit kar sakte hain, lekin best practice ye hai ki purana invoice cancel karke naya invoice bhejein, taaki sab clean rahe. Agar aap GST-registered hain, toh existing invoice ko cancel karke fresh invoice create karna chahiye. Isse aapke invoice serial numbers aur dates correct rahenge. Process ko fast karne ke liye, aap purane invoice ko duplicate karke necessary changes kar sakte hain aur phir send kar sakte hain. Yeh approach compliance maintain karne mein help karta hai aur records tidy rakhta hai!

items.question: Maine abhi apna Payment Method change kiya. Kya iska effect mere current invoice par padega?
items.answer: Jo invoices aapne payment change se pehle bheje hain, unmein purane payment details hi dikhenge. Aapki updated payout information save ho gayi hai aur yeh saare future invoices aur payouts ke liye use hogi. Lekin, ensure karein ki aapke naye bank details fully verified hain next payment date se pehle. Agar purana payment system ab paise accept nahi karta, toh un brands ko jaldi update bhejna hoga jahan payment abhi pending hai, taaki delays avoid ho sakein.

items.question: Non-paying brands ke final collection aur public disclosure ke liye Sparkonomy ke steps kya hain?
items.answer: Agar koi brand aapka payment ignore kar raha hai, toh yeh cool nahi hai. Hum abhi legal support provide nahi karte, lekin kuch smart hacks hai jo aapko payment lene mein help karenge. Hum suggest karenge ki kaise strong follow-up messages draft karein aur pro steps lein taaki payment jaldi aa jaye without kisi drama ke. Aap control mein rahenge, aur hum ensure karenge ki process smooth aur pro rahe.

items.question: Kya mujhe brands se milne wale free products aur sponsored trips par tax dena hoga?
items.answer: Haan. Law aapki services ke liye milne wali kisi bhi form ki payment ko taxable income maanta hai - chahe woh cash ho, products ho ya experiences. Agar koi brand aapko sponsored collaboration ke under ek particular amount se zyada value ka gift deta hai, toh aapko uski poori retail value income ke taur par declare karni hoti hai. Isliye jo bhi products ya benefits aapko milte hain, unka record rakhein aur retail value note karein, taaki tax filing ke time sahi reporting ho sake.

items.question: Main ek hi time par multiple brand deals kaise manage karun?
items.answer: Jab deals WhatsApp, email aur Instagram DMs mein scattered hoti hain, tab chaos hota hai. Iska simple rule hai: sab kuch ek jagah track karein. Har deal ke liye yeh 4 cheezein zaroor note karo: Brand name, Payment amount, Due date, aur Payment status. Sparkonomy ke AI tool se yeh sab bahut easy ho jata hai. Aapke vendor registration se lekar, invoices, payment status aur income management - sab hum sambhalte hain.

items.question: Kya camera equipment aur software ke kharche tax deduction ke liye claim kiye ja sakte hain?
items.answer: Haan, agar aap self-employed creator ya registered business hain, toh aap genuine business expenses ko income se deduct kar sakte hain. Isme camera gear, editing software, props, studio rent, aur ghar se kaam karte hain toh internet ka ek portion shaamil hain. Rule simple hain: Sirf wahi kharche karein jo actually content creation ke liye use hote hain, aur receipts sambhaal ke rakhein.

referral.message: ka manna hai ki yeh app creators ke liye sabse easy hai — aap bhi ise try karke dekho. Aaj hi Sign Up karo!
